en.title: {{Software Engineer II}}
en.text: Designing and developing scalable backend APIs using Spring Boot and MySQL while building reusable React components following [[Atomic Design principles]]. Integrated Storybook for component documentation and testing. Implemented secure authentication using JWT and ensured reliability through unit and integration testing with JUnit and Mockito.
list: Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Boot
Built reusable UI components with React.js
Wrote unit & integration tests using JUnit and Mockito

en.title: {{Software Developer}}
en.text: Developed and maintained government web portals using Java, React.js, and Spring Boot. Played a key role in migrating legacy Struts applications to [[Spring MVC]], improving scalability and maintainability. Designed backend APIs, optimized PostgreSQL and SQL Server databases, and contributed to distributed system deployments.
list: Migrated Struts-based applications to Spring MVC
Developed REST APIs using Spring Boot
Supported CI/CD and deployment processes using Git
